item.title: CVE-2022-23082|2024-09-17T02:42:40.198Z -- whitesource -- curekit
item.description: In CureKit versions v1.0.1 through v1.1.3 are vulnerable to path traversal as the function isFileOutsideDir fails to sanitize the user input which may lead to path traversal.
